channel.title: Twitter Followers
channel.description: Does anyone know of a website that offers some kind of follow for follow system on twitter? Someone mentioned this to me and I see a reason to use twitter now and I want to make several accounts and get like 1k+ followers on all of them as fast as I can.

item.title: Twitter Followers
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Does anyone know of a website that offers some kind of follow for follow system on twitter? Someone mentioned this to me and I see a reason to use twitter now and I want to make several accounts and get like 1k+ followers on all of them as fast as I can.

Read full topic
